name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens discovered that there are not only white and black people among the foreign Wumao, but also Japanese.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a video of a government worker complaining about "too many unruly people" in 2020 has re-circulated. In the video, a worker from Wancheng Town, Wanning City, Hainan mentioned in a live broadcast of Hainan official media that there are now "too many unruly people" and said that the unruly people are supported by the news media. The official media host immediately stopped him and severely criticized him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A blogger was banned from Weibo for reposting this set of rumor-debunking pictures on Weibo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Ministry of Industry and Information Technology issued a draft for comments on the 19th, requiring electric bicycles to add Beidou positioning and dynamic safety monitoring functions

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 20, Reuters quoted two people familiar with the matter as saying that the Beijing branch of China Minsheng Bank had cut salaries across the board, with the highest reduction reaching 50%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 13, Wuhan. Ms. Yu, a 60-year-old woman, sought help from Daxiangbang (an interactive platform affiliated to Henan Radio and Television Station to help the people). She said that on April 17 this year, when she went to Dengta Village, Anshan Street, Jiangxia District, Wuhan to ask for money from her debtor, she encountered police officers from the Jingang Police Station of the Jiangxia Branch who were catching gamblers. She happened to be at the scene and was arrested as a gambler. She was also beaten by the police and three ribs were broken. The judicial appraisal opinion showed that the old woman's injuries were second-degree minor injuries. The police from the police station involved responded to the reporter of Daxiang News: No one was beaten.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 22 (released), a kindergarten required children and parents to watch the "National Defense Open Class" program together and take photos and check in.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 21 (Released) Dazhou, Sichuan. Propaganda slogan of Qujiang Town, Qu County: Raise your own parents, do not push the government or the party.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 22, Dezhou, Shandong. A fire broke out in the Qihe County Finance Bureau building. Videos showed a building on fire with thick smoke rising into the sky. Official: The fire has been put out, the cause of the fire is under investigation, and the accident caused no casualties.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On Sunday, the 2024 Kunming Half Marathon started. Because the runners started in the main urban area of the First Ring Road, many residents were late for work that day, and complaints were everywhere on social platforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 21, an author counted the number of Kuaishou videos that incited anti-Japanese sentiment and the number of likes. The article wrote that 287 anti-Japanese videos on the Kuaishou platform that "demolished Japanese schools" had not been reviewed and received more than 2.3 million likes, with the highest number of likes reaching more than 327,000. The article concluded that "Japanese schools" have become a traffic code, and according to the narratives of some "patriotic netizens" on Kuaishou, Japanese schools hide a huge spy conspiracy that needs to be denounced and eliminated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Liu Wenjie, director of the Hunan Finance Department, died unexpectedly. A total of three people fell from the building. Recently, a wife who claimed to be the victim posted that her husband had been doing business honestly. Previously, her husband said that he was going out to discuss business. If the business was successful, life would be better. But after that, she could not contact her husband again. The wife believed that her husband did not even dare to kill a chicken, so it was impossible for him to kidnap someone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 22 (Release), a woman named He Yali reported Li Kai, the former head of the Security Department of the General Hospital of the Armed Police Force, under her real name. After retiring, Li Kai pretended to be an active-duty officer, forged the official seal of the Armed Police Force, and defrauded the woman of more than 830,000 yuan. The woman reported the case to the Tiancun Police Station of the Haidian Branch of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau, but the police station responded that it would not accept the case; she also reported to her former unit, but it was also not accepted. Li Kai has a strong background, and his brother-in-law is a senior executive of the PLA Military Band. The woman was blocked from defending her rights and had no way to sue, so she had no choice but to report under her real name.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 21, the public account "Chang'an Street Governor" published an article: Why did Japan compromise after a year of resistance? The article mentioned that Japan has been discharging nuclear contaminated water for more than a year. As of now, monitoring data shows that aquatic products are not contaminated by radioactivity. Japan accepted China's request for independent sampling mainly under pressure from the international community, and China's resolute struggle played an important role in this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 21, Guangzhou, Guangdong. The Internet exposed that the Qiming branch of Guangzhou Jiandanhao Education Group asked employees to lie on the ground to welcome the leaders, and many employees worked more than ten hours a day for the dividends of the so-called entrepreneurial listing partners of the group.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 21, Professor Zhao Hong and Associate Professor Chen Bi of China University of Political Science and Law published an article titled "What Can We Do for the Dead Children?" The article mentioned: "We should not condone any atrocities propaganda under the banner of patriotism. If someone uses this to arbitrarily destroy individual lives, it must be anti-human. If a society can tolerate labeling those who brutally kill innocent children as "anti-Japanese heroes", it must be a crime." The original article has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 22 (published), the owners of Hengda Feicui Huating Community in Puyang, Henan reported that although the government promised to deliver the buildings, the resumption of the project has repeatedly become a formality, and it is all a show-off. Every time an owner petitions, the relevant department always uses a completion deadline that has never been fulfilled to send the owner away. Once an owner discusses in the group that he wants to go to the relevant department to solve the problem, he will receive harassing and threatening calls from the police station.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/NJ1zFYvQpR

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 22, the Wuhou District Branch of the Chengdu Public Security Bureau of Sichuan Province issued a police report: At about 19:00 on September 21, a person fell to his death at the Cujin Wanda Plaza. After receiving the alarm, our bureau quickly organized police forces to rush to the scene to conduct investigations and disposal. After on-site investigation, review of surveillance, and interviews with the masses, it was initially found that Luo (female, 37 years old, from Chengdu, who had been treated in the hospital for bipolar disorder and was still taking medication recently) climbed over the guardrail on the 3rd floor platform of Wanda Plaza at 19:44 on the same day and fell to the second floor below ground, hitting a passerby Li (female, 70 years old, from Nanbu County, Sichuan Province). The two were later declared dead after 120 on-site rescue failed. At present, follow-up work is being further carried out. Please respect the deceased and their families, and do not believe or spread rumors.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The U.S. Commerce Department is expected to propose on Monday a ban on the use of Chinese software and hardware in Internet and self-driving cars on U.S. roads for security reasons. The U.S. government has expressed serious concerns about Chinese companies collecting data on U.S. drivers and infrastructure, and about foreign countries potentially manipulating vehicles connected to Internet navigation systems.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 22 (released), a food delivery rider who had resigned from the company released a video revealing the industry insider information he had seen. He mentioned that "the stores with the highest ratings on the food delivery platform are likely to be stores opened by the platform itself, and negative reviews can be deleted and ratings can be modified."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 21, Hunan Yiyang criminal policeman Cai Minghui was exposed online for threatening the family of an entrepreneur who was tortured and forced to confess: "Believe it or not, the next person to be beaten and disabled will be you." "I laugh at the fact that you rights defenders have nowhere to turn to for help, kneeling at the door of the procuratorate. Seeing your pitiful appearance, I feel so happy and comfortable in my heart."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 21, a major leak occurred in CSP-J/S, a national competition for primary and secondary school students in the field of computer science.
According to a PDF circulated online, a teacher claiming to be from Shaanxi Hongquan Institution revealed that he received a test paper from his leader the day before the exam and asked him to explain it to the students in the institution. However, it was later discovered that the test paper he explained contained a large number of real questions for the next day's exam.
The teacher said that this cheating behavior is a blatant provocation to the fairness of our country's exams. I can't imagine that so many children study hard, but in the end they miss the rematch because someone leaked the questions. I can't imagine that our children usually work diligently on the questions, but in the end they are accused of cheating because of the selfishness, greed and stupidity of the institution.
It is reported that in addition to the institutional leak of the Junior group of primary school students, the Senior group of high school students had their questions leaked online 50 minutes before the start of the exam...
fullContent:
9月21日，面向国内中小学生在计算机科学领域的全国赛事CSP-J/S，发生了重大泄题事件。
网传PDF显示，一名自称陕西鸿泉机构的老师曝光，自己在考试前一天收到了领导提供的一份试卷，并要求其讲解给机构中的学生们。然而事后发现，自己讲解的这份试卷中存在大量第二天考试的真题。
这位老师表示，这种作弊行为是对我国考试公正性的公然挑衅。不敢想象那么多孩子辛辛苦苦地学习，最后因为有人泄题而无缘复赛。更不敢想象我们的孩子平常也勤勤恳恳地做题，最后因为机构的自私、贪婪和愚蠢，而让孩子背上作弊的罪名。
据悉，除了小学生的Junior组发生机构泄题事件之外，高中生的Senior组在开考前50分钟，题目就在网上被人泄漏。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 21 (Released) Shanghai. The man said he went to a 211 university in Shanghai to attend a campus recruitment fair. The number of graduate students and doctoral students graduating from the university this year has exceeded that of undergraduates, but only one-third of undergraduates actually have employment intentions, and the rest are planning to take the postgraduate entrance examination or study abroad. Among the students who came to apply, graduate students accounted for half. And almost all students expressed pessimism and frustration about the current job market.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 21, Sichuan. Two men held a sign that read "Support Professor Li Ling in achieving universal free medical care" and paraded through the streets. Many netizens expressed their wish to join the parade.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 21, Zhengzhou, Henan. Urban management officers snatched balloons from a vendor. The vendor held the balloon tightly, with "I love my motherland" written on the wall behind him. Netizens responded, "I love my motherland too, but who loves me?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a man in Hebei used the minimum hourly wage of 24 yuan in Shanghai to test his purchasing power in a supermarket. He found that he could not afford bananas, Fuji apples, dragon fruit, and all kinds of vegetables. In the end, the blogger bought the cheapest bananas, 2 eggs, a little rice, a bag of noodles, a bag of milk worth 3 yuan, and minced meat worth 10 yuan. The man sighed, "The purchasing power is so strong that I can't spend it all. The social development is really great!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 21, Beijing. A delivery boy said that when he was delivering food to a customer, he found that the rider's terminal showed a 5-minute timeout, while the customer's client showed a 15-minute timeout. The man said, "Is the Meituan app setting this way asking for trouble?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 21 (Release) A netizen wanted to mail a package from Japan to Taiwan, but he insisted on writing "China" in the country column and "Taiwan" in the delivery city column. As a result, the Japanese express company called back and told the netizen that the country must be written as Taiwan before it can be mailed, and it cannot be sent if it is written as Taiwan, China. The netizen said that he has tried very hard on the Taiwan issue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 22, Shanxi. A retired soldier posted a video saying that his parents were retired cadres. In 2017, his parents' house was demolished by force. They have been running around for rights protection for many years but have not been able to resolve the issue. His parents also passed away with regrets and hatred. The man said, "They firmly believe in the party and the law, and I also believe that justice will eventually come."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Xuchang, Henan, the Jinyi Yuecheng real estate project was left unfinished, and the owners protested outside the government department, shouting slogans such as "Please ask the government to make decisions for the people."
September 22, Huairen City, Shanxi. Yulong Ceramics Factory owed workers 19 to 24 years of wages, and the workers held banners outside the company to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 21 (Release) Netizens posted a new version of the seventh-grade art textbook. Most of the content in the textbook is related to the Long March, Mao Zedong, the Anti-Japanese War, and the Olympics.
